title: unripe_banana_delayed_ripening_cool_weather
summary: Observation of harvested bananas remaining unripe several days after cutting during cool weather conditions.
description: Image documents a bunch of bananas harvested earlier and remaining unripe after several days. The bananas were cut on 2026-01-08 and left to ripen naturally. Low ambient temperatures during the following mornings are referenced as a contributing environmental factor.

environmental_references.condition_note: Cool morning temperatures observed over multiple consecutive days

context_notes: Observation focuses on environmental influence on ripening process

external_reference.note: Image used for post-harvest crop observation only.
